DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind , control study design investigate efficacy electrical muscle simulation ( EMS ) treatment waist circumference ( WC ) reduction abdominal obese adult . 60 patient abdominal obese , man WC > 90 cm woman WC > 80 cm , receive EMS experimental group ( EG ) transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) control group ( CG ) 5 time week 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Electrical Muscle Stimulation Waist Circumference Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Background : This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind , control study design investigate efficacy electrical muscle simulation ( EMS ) treatment waist circumference ( WC ) reduction abdominal obese adult . Methods : 60 patient abdominal obese , man WC > 90 cm woman WC > 80 cm , receive EMS experimental group ( EG ) transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) control group ( CG ) 5 time week 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Subject abdominal obese seventy subject age 18 65 year Abdominal obesity define WC > 90 cm men WC > 80 cm woman define base AsiaPacific criterion International Diabetes Federation . pregnant breastfeeding , take treatment weight loss medication know affect weight weight loss 3 % precede 3 month , undergone major surgery 1 year prior study commencement insert metallic material include pacemaker . aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) 100 mg/dL serum creatinine ( Cr ) 1.5 mg/dL history coronary arterial disease cerebrovascular disease , impairment major organ system , cancer , severe lung disease , severe cerebral trauma , uncontrolled hypertension psychiatric disease include eat disorder , etc .
